src:
Jadwal Timnas U-19 di Ajang Kualifikasi Piala AFC U-19 2020
04 Nov 2019, 14:31 by Tempo.co, Rina Widiastuti
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Tim Nasional Indonesia U-19 atau Timnas U-19 mempersiapkan diri dan fokus menjelang persiapan akhir untuk kualifikasi Piala AFC U-19 2020 yang akan berlangsung di Stadion Madya dan Stadion Gelora Bung Karno pada 6-10 November mendatang.
Tim ini merampungkan rangkaian pemusatan latihan dan seleksi pemain di Bogor, mereka juga telah menjalani uji coba lokal dan dua uji coba internasional melawan Timnas Cina U-19.
Hasil uji coba lokal, Timnas U-19 mengalahkan tim Pra PON DKI 3-0 dan bermain imbang tanpa gol saat melawan Tira Persikabo. Sedangkan, saat melawan Cina U-19 di Gelora Bung Tomo, Surabaya, menang 3-1 dan ketika bermain di Stadion Kapten I Wayan Dipta, Bali, kalah 1-3.
Memasuki persiapan akhir, tim ini terus fokus membenahi transisi positif dan negatif antarlini di lapangan. "Kami pada setiap latihan dan menuju akhir pemusatan latihan, masih fokus mempertajam transisi positif dan negatif. Artinya peralihan dari situasi bertahan ke menyerang, begitu juga sebaliknya," kata Fakhri seperti dikutip dari situs resmi PSSI, Senin, 4 November 2019.
Fakhri juga melakukan perubahan pemain di beberapa posisi di lapangan. Hal ini dilakukan agar membuat pemain bisa bermain lebih dari satu posisi di lapang. "Ini penting bagi kami, untuk dilakukan, karena saya ingin coba merotasi beberapa pemain, supaya mereka bisa merasakan bermain di satu posisi saja," ujarnya.
Timnas U-19 berada di grup K. Untuk bisa melaju ke babak berikutnya, Indonesia akan bersaing dengan tiga tim lain, Korea Utara, Hongkong, dan Timor-Leste.
Berikut jadwal Timnas U-19 di kualifikasi Piala AFC U-19 2020:
6 November 2019, 19.00 WIB (Stadion Madya)Indonesia vs Timor Leste
8 November 2019, 19.00 WIB (Stadion Madya)Hongkong vs Indonesia
10 November 2019, 19.00 WIB (Stadion Gelora Bung Karno)Indonesia vs Korea Utara

PSSI
text:
U-19 National Team Schedule at AFC U-19 2020 Qualification Cup Event
04 Nov 2019, 14:31 by Tempo.co, Rina Widiastuti
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Indonesian U-19 National Team or U-19 National Team prepare themselves and focus ahead of the final preparations for the AFC U-19 2020 qualification which will take place at Madya Stadium and Gelora Bung Karno Stadium on November 6-10.
The team completed a series of training camps and selection of players in Bogor, they have also undergone local trials and two international trials against the China U-19 national team.
Local trial results, the U-19 national team defeated the Pre-PON DKI team 3-0 and played a goalless draw against Tira Persikabo. Meanwhile, against China U-19 at Gelora Bung Tomo, Surabaya, won 3-1 and when playing at the Captain I Wayan Dipta Stadium, Bali, lost 1-3.
Entering the final preparations, the team continues to focus on fixing the positive and negative transitions between lines on the field. "We are at every exercise and towards the end of the training camp, we are still focused on sharpening the positive and negative transitions. This means that the transition from a defensive to attacking situation, and vice versa," Fakhri was quoted as saying on the PSSI official website, Monday, November 4, 2019.
Fakhri also changes players in several positions on the field. This is done so that players can play in more than one position in the field. "This is important for us, to do, because I want to try rotating several players, so they can feel playing in one position," he said.
U-19 national team is in group K. To be able to advance to the next round, Indonesia will compete with three other teams, North Korea, Hong Kong and Timor-Leste.
Following is the schedule for the U-19 national team in the AFC U-19 2020 qualifiers:
6 November 2019, 19.00 WIB (Madya Stadium) Indonesia vs Timor Leste
8 November 2019, 19.00 WIB (Madya Stadium) Hongkong vs Indonesia
10 November 2019, 19.00 WIB (Gelora Bung Karno Stadium) Indonesia vs North Korea

PSSI
